languages.text: "Разве это не прекрасно? Ради Вольного Торговца Ирлиэт лишилась самого дорогого, чем обладала. Сколько боли принес этот выбор. Сколько страха..."
"Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"
languages.original_text: "Разве это не прекрасно? Ради Вольного Торговца Ирлиэт лишилась самого дорогого, чем обладала. Сколько боли принес этот выбор. Сколько страха..."

traits.locale_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “这是多么凄美啊！为了救行商浪人，伊莉耶特放弃了自己最珍贵的东西。这样的选择带来了多少痛苦？多少恐惧？”
languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"

traits.locale_text: “这是多么凄美啊！为了救行商浪人，伊莉耶特放弃了自己最珍贵的东西。这样的选择带来了多少痛苦？多少恐惧？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « N'est-ce pas magnifique ? Yrliet a sacrifié son bien le plus précieux pour sauver {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Comme elle a dû souffrir ! Comme elle a dû avoir peur... »
languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"

traits.locale_text: « N'est-ce pas magnifique ? Yrliet a sacrifié son bien le plus précieux pour sauver {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Comme elle a dû souffrir ! Comme elle a dû avoir peur... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿No es precioso? Para proteger a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Yrliet ha abandonado su posesión más preciada. ¿Cuánto dolor ha causado su decisión? ¿Cuánto miedo?».
languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No es precioso? Para proteger a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Yrliet ha abandonado su posesión más preciada. ¿Cuánto dolor ha causado su decisión? ¿Cuánto miedo?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「美しいだろ？自由開拓者のために、ユリエットは一番貴重な財産を失った。その選択がどれほどの苦痛をもたらしたか？どれほどの恐怖を？」
languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"

traits.locale_text: 「美しいだろ？自由開拓者のために、ユリエットは一番貴重な財産を失った。その選択がどれほどの苦痛をもたらしたか？どれほどの恐怖を？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ist es nicht wunderschön? Zum Wohle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat Yrliet ihren wertvollsten Besitz aufgegeben. Wie viel Schmerz hat diese Entscheidung ausgelöst? Wie viel Angst?"
languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist es nicht wunderschön? Zum Wohle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat Yrliet ihren wertvollsten Besitz aufgegeben. Wie viel Schmerz hat diese Entscheidung ausgelöst? Wie viel Angst?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"

languages.text: "Şahane değil mi? Yrliet, sırf Hür Tacir için en kıymetli varlığından feragat etti. Kim bilir nasıl korktu, nasıl da canı yandı..."
languages.original_text: "Isn't it beautiful? For the sake of the Rogue Trader, Yrliet has forfeited her most precious possession. How much pain that choice has caused? How much fear?"
